commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Hup, hup... It must have been quite the task to put together an aqua course with such a huge jungle gym.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I wonder if Karin's okay? I did what she said and went on without her after she fell in the water, but...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I know that only one of us has to get to the finish line for us to win, but I wish we could reach it together.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Now's my chance!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Ah!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: *Giggle* You snooze, you lose! I'll be taking back the lead from here!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You! N-Not if I have my way! Here I come!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Ack! You got past me! I never took you to be so competitive, Shizuku!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm carrying Karin's hopes along with me! There's no way I can afford to lose!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* The last obstacle is... Another slide?! But just past it is...!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Get back here, Shizuku!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Eep! When did you catch up to me?!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Shizuku! You! We have finally caught up with you! That shaved ice belongs to Î¼'s! I won't let anybody take it from us!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You're not even trying to hide your true feelings anymore, huh...?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Go on ahead, Shizuku! Shake them off!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* *Wheeze* Sh-Shaved ice...

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Aagh! That was a huge wave! This whole thing's rocking like crazy!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Eep! I-I cannot afford to slip here!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: If I do, I'll waste precious time trying to recover. The goal is right there before my very eyes! I cannot lose footing here...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: B-But, but... Whoa, whoa, AHHH!

commands.speaker: Shizuku, You
commands.line: (Shizuku) GYAH! (You) WAH!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Oh no, I'm losing bala... Ack!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Whoa, Umi! Huh!?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Look out! EEEK!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Urgh... It's almost as if this wave waited until just the right time to crash.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Gasp* I'm just falling all over the place today.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* Here we were at the end of the line, and that wave had to knock us off track...

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: But it's not over yet!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: She's quite right! At the end of this slide is the goal in all its glory--

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Zuraaaaaaa!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Shizuku, You, Karin, Umi, Maki
commands.line: WHAAAAAAT?!
